scripts:
create service user indesign-system-user
 add indesign-system-user to group administrators

set ACL on /conf/global
 allow jcr:read for wefinance-service-user
 end

set ACL on /conf
 allow jcr:read for wefinance-service-user
 end

set ACL on /content
 allow jcr:all for wefinance-service-user
 end

set ACL on /content/dam
 allow jcr:all for wefinance-service-user
 end

set ACL on /content/cq:tags
 allow jcr:all for wefinance-service-user
 end

set ACL on /content/experience-fragments
 allow jcr:all for wefinance-service-user
 end

set ACL on /home/groups
 allow jcr:read for wefinance-service-user
 end

set ACL on /home/users
 allow jcr:read for wefinance-service-user
 end

set ACL on /var/workflow
 allow jcr:all for wefinance-service-user
 end
